name: Buttons In Endscreen
description: Adds the level page buttons to the endscreen

show-like-button.name: Show Like Button
show-like-button.description: Shows the like/dislike button in the endscreen

show-rate-button.name: Show Rate Button
show-rate-button.description: Shows the rate stars/demon button in the endscreen

show-info-button.name: Show Info Button
show-info-button.description: Shows the level info button in the endscreen

show-comments-button.name: Show Comments Button
show-comments-button.description: Shows the comments button in the endscreen
